title: New York Office of Cannabis Management 2022 and 2023 FOIL logs

communications.subject: New York Freedom of Information Law Request: New York Office of Cannabis Management 2022 and 2023 FOIL logs
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

A copy of the log of all Freedom of Information Law requests made with your agency for calendar years 2022 and 2023. I ask that all fields — including the date, requester, description and disposition — are included.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Ben Welsh

communications.subject: New York Freedom of Information Law Request: New York cannabis closure referrals
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

An electronic spreadsheet of all closure referrals your agency has made to a court for cannabis related activities.

I ask that all data fields be made available in the release, including the referral date, the operator, the violation description, the ultimate disposition of the case and all other metadata.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Ben Welsh

communications.subject: New York Freedom of Information Law Request: New York cannabis operator fines
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

An electronic spreadsheet of all fines levied by your agency for cannabis related activities.

I ask that all data fields be made available in the release, including the fine date, the operator, the violation description, the ultimate disposition of the case and all other metadata.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Ben Welsh

title: New York cannabis notices of violation

communications.subject: New York Freedom of Information Law Request: New York cannabis notices of violation
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

An electronic spreadsheet of all notices of violation logged by your agency for cannabis related activities.

I ask that all data fields be made available in the release, including the inspection date, the operator, the ultimate disposition of their citation and all other metadata.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Ben Welsh
